original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 18.4. Hetuduka, Cūḷantaraduka
analyzed: hetu duka cūḍantara duka

original: Nahetu appaccayo dhammo nanahetussa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: na hetu appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na na hetussa na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: …pe… nahetu appaccayo dhammo nahetussa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na hetu appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Nahetu appaccayo dhammo nahetussa naappaccayassa ca nanahetussa naappaccayassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ na hetu appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na appaccayassa ca na na hetussa na appaccayassa

original: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo saṅkhitta

original: Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi. (Asaṅkhataṁ appaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi asaṅkhatam appaccaya sadisa

original: Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na hetu sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na na hetussa na sa nidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ na hetu sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa nidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanassa ca nanahetussa nasanidassanassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ na hetu sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa nidassanassa ca na na hetussa na sa nidassanassa

original: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye
analyzed: ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā upanissaye

original: purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: purejāte atthiyā a vigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum anidassanam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Hetuṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ rūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum rūpim dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum arūpim dhammam paṭicca na hetu na arūpī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum lokiyam dhammam paccayā na na hetu na lokiyaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetum lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca na hetu na lokuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca na hetu na lokuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ lokuttarañca nahetuṁ lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo
analyzed: hetum lokuttaram ca na hetum lokuttaram ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetum kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Hetuṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetum na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
